items.sentence: I\'m beginning to suspect that\'s not going to happen.
Tom\'s house is at least three times larger than mine.
Tom\'s mother often left him alone when he was a baby.
All three of our daughters will be here for Christmas.
Before doing that, you need to ask Tom for permission.
Could you make sure Tom remembers to bring a swimsuit?
Did you break up with Tom or did he break up with you?
I thought the woman I met yesterday was Tom\'s mother.
They said they were dissatisfied with their low wages.
They think that Tom followed Mary home and killed her.
This history book is written for high school students.
Tom can do whatever he wants as far as I\'m concerned.
Tom couldn\'t help overhearing what Mary said to John.
I heard that Tom and Mary are planning to get married.
I heard that Tom and Mary have both been hospitalized.
I heard that both Tom and Mary have been hospitalized.
I imagine that you went through a lot of difficulties.
Are you planning on staying in Boston for a long time?
Are you sure one bottle of wine is going to be enough?
Are you sure you want to leave without saying goodbye?
Everywhere you look you can see young couples kissing.
He read the letter with tears running down his cheeks.
I haven\'t had to deal with this kind of thing before.
I know we don\'t really know each other all that well.
Tom is the only guy I know who has a pilot\'s license.
Tom started the car and pulled out of the parking lot.
Tom missed the last train and had to take a taxi home.
Everybody here knows that Tom speaks very good French.
From somewhere in the distance came an ominous rumble.
Go ahead and blame me if it makes you feel any better.
Most people in Boston don\'t really care what happens.
Tom was able to get there in less than twenty minutes.
Tom was an astute businessman who made a lot of money.
Tom was leaning against a tree, sucking on a lollipop.
The queen shook hands with each player after the game.
The result of the election will be announced tomorrow.
Tom isn\'t going to be upset if Mary doesn\'t do that.
Tom hasn\'t heard from Mary since she moved to Boston.
I suppose I\'ll have to be more careful in the future.
I thought Tom wouldn\'t notice that Mary wasn\'t here.
I know why Tom didn\'t want to go to Boston with Mary.
I\'m quite certain I don\'t want to be married to you.
I\'m still in Boston, but I\'ll be back home tomorrow.
Tom turned off the engine, but left the headlights on.
Tom used to spend a lot of time with his grandparents.
Tom was satisfied with the way Mary cleaned his house.
Please be sure to turn off the light before you leave.
Please wait until I have finished writing this letter.
I\'m very serious about wanting to be a good magician.
If I had a choice, I probably wouldn\'t be doing this.
